With Medisafe, technology allows you to easily log your medications and receive reminders to take them on time.
Medications can be scanned or typed into the app, with dosages and schedules set for each medication.
Medisafe is designed for people with chronic conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, asthma, or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) who need to manage multiple medications daily.

Track your medication schedule and get reminders when it’s time to take a dose.
